channel.title: WordPress plugin on Chris Engstrom
channel.description: Recent content in WordPress plugin on Chris Engstrom

item.title: Mother's Day
item.description: I know I am late because Mother’s Day was this past Sunday. I didn’t actually forget, thank you very little, I just found a neat plugin that I wanted to try out called Smart Youtube that lets you embed youtube videos into your WordPress site really easily. I posted this video on my mom’s Facebook wall to remind her of what it is like when I am home. Here goes nothing…
